root.InquirySqlQueryFirst: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, rownum r FROM (
root.InquirySqlQueryEnd: ORDER BY CUST_NO ) A WHERE rownum < (( ${pageNo} * ${pageSize}) + 1 ) ) WHERE r >= ((( ${pageNo} -1) * ${pageSize}) + 1)
root.IWGT: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'IWGT' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, GTEE_AMT AMOUNT,GTEE_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, APPL_NM BENE_NM, EXPIRY_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IWGT_EM_STLMNT
root.IMCO: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'IMCO' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, COLL_AMT AMOUNT,COLL_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, DRWR_NM BENE_NM, DUE_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IMCO_EM_TRXN
root.FAEF: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'FAEF' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, COLL_AMT AMOUNT,COLL_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, DRWR_NM BENE_NM, DUE_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IMCO_EM_TRXN
root.EXCO: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'EXCO' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, COLL_AMT AMOUNT,COLL_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, DRWE_NM BENE_NM, DUE_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.EXCO_EM_CREATE
root.SHGT: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'SHGT' C_MODULE,'' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE, COLL_AMT AMOUNT,COLL_CCY CURRENCY,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, DRWE_NM BENE_NM, DUE_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.SHGT_EM_GTEEDTLS
root.EXLC: SELECT CUST_NO,C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF, C_MODULE, C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, (SELECT LC_AMT FROM CETRX.EXLC_EM_ADV iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS AMOUNT,(SELECT LC_CCY FROM CETRX.EXLC_EM_ADV iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS CURRENCY, (SELECT BENE_NM FROM CETRX.EXLC_EM_ADV iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS BENE_NM, (SELECT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.EXLC_EM_ADV iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.TRX_INBOX A WHERE 1=1 AND (C_TRX_STATUS IN('P','T')) AND C_MODULE = 'EXLC' AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND (C_TRX_STATUS <>'R' AND C_TRX_STATUS <> 'A' OR C_TRX_STATUS IS NULL) AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_TRX_ID NOT IN (SELECT C_TRX_ID FROM CETRX.TRX_AUTH_LIST WHERE C_GRP_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_USER_ID = '${userid}' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' ) AND C_TRX_ID IN(SELECT C_TRX_ID FROM CETRX.TRX_MATRIX_LIST WHERE C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND (I_AUTH_LEVEL IN (SELECT I_AUTH_LEVEL FROM CEUSER.SEC_USER_INFO WHERE C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_USER_ID = '${userid}') OR I_AUTH_LEVEL = -1))
root.EXLCCOUNT: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'EXLC' C_MODULE,'F05030700912' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, LC_AMT AMOUNT,LC_CCY CURRENCY, BENE_NM BENE_NM, EXPIRY_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.EXLC_EM_ADV WHERE ( 1=1 ) AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}'
root.IMLC: SELECT CUST_NO,C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF, C_MODULE, C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, (SELECT LC_AMT FROM CETRX.IMLC_EM_ISSUE iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS AMOUNT,(SELECT LC_CCY FROM CETRX.IMLC_EM_ISSUE iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS CURRENCY, (SELECT BENE_NM FROM CETRX.IMLC_EM_ISSUE iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS BENE_NM, (SELECT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IMLC_EM_ISSUE iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.TRX_INBOX A WHERE 1=1 AND (C_TRX_STATUS IN('P','T')) AND C_MODULE = 'IMLC' AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND (C_TRX_STATUS <>'R' AND C_TRX_STATUS <> 'A' OR C_TRX_STATUS IS NULL) AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_TRX_ID NOT IN (SELECT C_TRX_ID FROM CETRX.TRX_AUTH_LIST WHERE C_GRP_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_USER_ID = '${userid}' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' ) AND C_TRX_ID IN(SELECT C_TRX_ID FROM CETRX.TRX_MATRIX_LIST WHERE C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND (I_AUTH_LEVEL IN (SELECT I_AUTH_LEVEL FROM CEUSER.SEC_USER_INFO WHERE C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_USER_ID = '${userid}') OR I_AUTH_LEVEL = -1))
root.IMLCCOUNT: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'IMLC' C_MODULE,'F05030700829' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, LC_AMT AMOUNT,LC_CCY CURRENCY, BENE_NM BENE_NM, EXPIRY_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.IMLC_EM_ISSUE WHERE ( 1=1 ) AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}'
root.OWGT: SELECT CUST_NO,C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF, C_MODULE, C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, (SELECT GTEE_AMT FROM CETRX.OWGT_EM_GTEEDTLS iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS AMOUNT,(SELECT GTEE_CCY FROM CETRX.OWGT_EM_GTEEDTLS iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS CURRENCY, (SELECT BENE_NM FROM CETRX.OWGT_EM_GTEEDTLS iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS BENE_NM, (SELECT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.OWGT_EM_GTEEDTLS iei WHERE iei.PARENT_MAIN_REF = A.PARENT_MAIN_REF) AS EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.TRX_INBOX A WHERE 1=1 AND (C_TRX_STATUS IN('P','T')) AND C_MODULE = 'OWGT' AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND (C_TRX_STATUS <>'R' AND C_TRX_STATUS <> 'A' OR C_TRX_STATUS IS NULL) AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_TRX_ID NOT IN (SELECT C_TRX_ID FROM CETRX.TRX_AUTH_LIST WHERE C_GRP_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_USER_ID = '${userid}' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' ) AND C_TRX_ID IN(SELECT C_TRX_ID FROM CETRX.TRX_MATRIX_LIST WHERE C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND (I_AUTH_LEVEL IN (SELECT I_AUTH_LEVEL FROM CEUSER.SEC_USER_INFO WHERE C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}' AND C_USER_ID = '${userid}') OR I_AUTH_LEVEL = -1))
root.OWGTCOUNT: SELECT C_TRX_STATUS,PARENT_MAIN_REF,C_MAIN_REF,'OWGT' C_MODULE,'F05030700826' C_FUNC_ID,I_EVENT_TIMES,C_BK_GROUP_ID,C_UNIT_CODE,C_FUNC_SHORT_NAME, GTEE_AMT AMOUNT,GTEE_CCY CURRENCY, BENE_NM BENE_NM, EXPIRY_DT EXPIRY_DT FROM CETRX.OWGT_EM_GTEEDTLS WHERE ( 1=1 ) AND C_BK_GROUP_ID = 'CSBANK' AND C_UNIT_CODE = '${unitcode}'
